name: The Pampered Paramour...Your Mistress in the Kitchen
description:
A sexy, sassy, self-published cookbook that combines super simple recipes with classic vintage nudes. 

“The Pampered Paramour” is fun for everyone (over 18, of course). If you decide to take a Mistress home, take a little time to read through the Introduction so that you may become acquainted with how we created and developed this book. She will not only provide you with inexpensive, quick, easy ideas for dinner...she’s a great conversation piece. With sections like Foreplay, On the Side, and One Night Stands you're sure to find something that will pique your interest...and your appetite. Your husband is sure to find something in this naughty little creation to make your night Nice and Easy.  

This book is new, 76 pages, spiral bound, printed in full color, and its dimensions are 7.25 tall x 5.5 wide.  Please note: The photos in this book are reproductions of early 1900 vintage photos, although we made every attempt to enhance the images, some recreations of these photos contain flaws. (To the best of the knowledge of both the author and publishers, the photos in this book are vintage photos and vintage French postcards in the public domain -  either by copyright expiration or anonymous creators.)
